page.title: 11A chef, Bowness.
page.content: A{Chef}starts work at{2pm}and prepares dinner,this takes about three hours.He can make a large number of dishes such as,beef pork or fish.The{chef}puts the meat in the oven to cook. There are many different{vegetables}he could use but the popular ones are{carrots,peas and{potatoes.}When boiling the carrots he must have{butter,sugar}and a touch of{honey.}After the meat is cooked he takes it out of the oven and then roasts the{potatoes.}He cooks the{peas in salt water and finishes the{gravy. After the dinner is completed and the kitchen is left{clean}and{tidy}he checks the stock.At{10pm}he finishes work.The next morning he phones for fresh supplies.In{July}and{August}the {bar meals}are very popular.In the months{September}to{November}his largest trade is in{dinners.
